solution_line_template: We know the height of the sunflowers from Packet A is {packet_a_height} inches = Y + {taller_percentage}Y or {combined_factor}Y.
To figure out Y, we would divide both sides of the equation by {combined_factor}, like this: {packet_a_height} / {combined_factor} = {combined_factor}Y / {combined_factor} or {packet_b_height} = Y.
